topics.body:
And to top off the pile of fuckshit that was that match, I've been temporarily banned from matchmaking due to "quitting." It was obvious that I wasn't possibly going to do anything in that game, so I left. But apparently I've left too many times, when any time I've "left" recently was when Xbox Live crapped out and disconnected in the middle of a game.

Cheer me up, guys.
